SEARCH
Package Main

Class AntPopulation

java.lang.Object
Main.AntPopulation
public class AntPopulation extends Object
The AntPopulation class manages the population of ants in the simulation. It includes methods for adding and removing ants, starting the simulation, and accessing population properties.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static AntPopulation getInstance(int red_size, int blue_size) throws FileNotFoundException
      This method provides access to the AntPopulation instance. It is a static method that creates a new instance of the AntPopulation class if it does not exist.
      Parameters:
      red_size - The size of the red ant population.
      blue_size - The size of the blue ant population.
      Returns:
      The AntPopulation instance.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the required files are not found.

    • access

      Returns:
      The AntPopulation instance.

      public void AddRedAnt()

      public void removeAnt(Ant ant)
      This method removes an ant from the population.
      Parameters:
      ant - The ant to be removed.

    • start

      public void start() throws InterruptedException
      This method starts the simulation. It starts all the ants in the population.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if an error occurs during the simulation.
